content: knitted top in drops safran piece is knitted bottom up with rib size s - xxxl drops design pattern e-302 yarn group a **size** s - m/l - xl/xxl - xxxl measurements on chart show garment stretched the top is more narrow because of pattern **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-200-250-250 g colour 57 mauve **knitting gauge ** 24 stitches and 32 row in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 60 or 80 cm for rib
